Message.Title: Forget ebay- Free listings at Ebid + no final fees
Message.Msg: I just joined Ebid for about 50 bucks and for a lifetime I get no fees to list or on commissions. I don't know about you but ebay's 10% Final Value Fee just ate into my profits. I was sending them huge payments every month. Plus ebay's customer service is horrendous, I got the brush off. Ebid is the underdog and needs support. I have sold on other auction sites in the past and have always done well so I expect Ebid to be a good alternative to ebay. Ebay doesn't want small sellers anyway, at least just check ebid out, I don't get paid to say this so it doesn't matter to me I just hope ebid can get a few more buyers and sellers so it can become bigger.
